public class BeanMaker

extends model.Object

Use to create a ColdFusion Class (CFC) based on a structure of properties

Method Detail

createBean

package struct createBean(struct stProperties, [string objPathDotNotation='model.GlobalConfig'], [string setterAccess='public'])
Creatse and writes the bean file to the specified path

Parameters:
stProperties - structure of properties to be used for the Bean
objPathDotNotation - Dot path notation to destination of the CFC being generated. The destination package (folder) must exist.
setterAccess - A string value to determine the access to the setter methods. See coldfusion documentation for Function access property options.

fixBeanString

private string fixBeanString(string stringToFix)
Fixes the bean string dymmy characters. It Replaces <% and %> with < and > respectively.

Parameters:
stringToFix

fixObjectPath

private string fixObjectPath(string stringToFix, [string fromNotation='.'], [string toNotation='/'])
Fixes the objectPath format by replacing . (dots) with / (forward slashes)

Parameters:
stringToFix
fromNotation
toNotation

getArgumentType

private string getArgumentType(any argumentToCheck)
I check the argument's type and return the type as a string. Checks simple values to determine the apropriate CF DataType. If value can't be determined, it defaults to String.

Parameters:
argumentToCheck

indent

private string indent([numeric tabsQty='1'])
Returns tabs in ascii. Amount depends on the tabsQty input parameter.

Parameters:
tabsQty - Numeric value to determine the amount of tabs returned. Default value 1.
